WeaponTraitDef.label: insightful
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona speaks long forgotten truths to its bond. The person bonded to it gains extra research speed so long as they are bonded.

HediffDef.label: psychic truth
HediffDef.description: Research speed is increased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: rambling
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona constantly rambles useless distractions into their bond's mind. The bonded pawn takes a -15% hit to their research speed so long as the bond holds.

HediffDef.label: psychic mental derailment
HediffDef.description: Research speed is decreased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: driven
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona fills it's bond with energy, driving it forward. The bonded pawn gains a 20% increase to global work speed.

HediffDef.label: psychic work drive
HediffDef.description: My global work speed is increased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: slacking
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona seeks to 'conserve the high energy state of the universe' by resisting energy state changes made willingly by it's boonded. The bonded pawn loses 20% global work speed.

HediffDef.label: psychic energy state change inhibitor
HediffDef.description: My global work speed is decreased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: spotter
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona excels at giving marksman adivce to it's bond. The bonded pawn gains +3 to shooting accuracy.

HediffDef.label: psychic spotter
HediffDef.description: My shooting accuracy is increased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: protagonist-maker
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona has romatasised the idea of 'plot armour' and will take steps to witness with it's bond. The bonded pawn takes a -3 to shooting accuracy.

HediffDef.label: psychic oversightedness
HediffDef.description: My shooting accuracy is decreased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: poker faced
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona is great at reading a negotiation and whispers tips to it's bond to help close a deal. The bonded pawn gains 10% to their trade price improvement.

HediffDef.label: psychic negotiation assistance
HediffDef.description: My trade prices are increased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: begrimed
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona cracks the most inappropriate jokes when it's bond is attempting to be composed around others. The bonded pawn loses 10% to their trade price improvement.

HediffDef.label: psychically induced spontaneous laughter
HediffDef.description: My trade prices are being hampered by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: exact
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona helps guide the hand of the surgeon it is bonded to. The bonded pawn gains 10% to their surgery success chance.

HediffDef.label: psychic surgery guidance
HediffDef.description: My surgery success chance is increased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: careless
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona tends to make their bond miss critical details. The bonded pawn loses 10% to their surgery success chance.

HediffDef.label: psychic carelessness
HediffDef.description: My surgery success chance is being hampered by my bonded weapon.
